hero.headline: Where market science meets
hero.subheadline: We apply Elliott Wave theory, quantitative research, and automated systems to professional account management and long-term strategy development.
hero.notSignals: Not signals. Not speculation. A structured approach to the market.

services.title: Our
services.subtitle: Professional solutions for traders and investors

serviceAccountManagement.title: Professional Brokerage Account Advisory
serviceAccountManagement.subtitle: For Large Capital
serviceAccountManagement.description: Waves Logix provides professional advisory and analytical support for high-net-worth clients managing brokerage accounts in the Forex, gold, and oil markets.
transparencyPoints: Your capital always remains fully under your ownership
We do not receive, hold, or manage client funds
All actions performed only with your explicit consent

advisory.title: Personalized Investment Advisory
advisory.description: Individual market guidance tailored to your financial objectives, risk profile, and investment horizon.

monitoring.title: Daily Market Monitoring
monitoring.description: Ongoing analysis of Forex, gold, and oil markets, combining technical structures and macroeconomic factors.

recommendations.title: Clear Trade Recommendations
recommendations.description: Structured trade ideas with defined logic, entry zones, exit targets, and risk parameters.

risk.title: Risk Management Framework
risk.description: Guidance on position sizing, stop-loss placement, diversification, and capital preservation.

support.title: 24/7 Communication
support.description: Continuous access to consultations, strategic discussions, and educational support.

serviceAccountManagement.paymentDescription: Service fees are charged exclusively based on profits generated. You pay only for results.

howItWorks.title: How Our Cooperation Is Structured
steps: A formal advisory and analytical support agreement is signed
Your brokerage account remains under your control at all times
All operations require your consent and oversight
No access to funds without direct authorization

whyChoose.title: Why Clients Choose Waves Logix
reasons: Proven experience working with large-capital accounts
Focus on Forex, gold, and oil markets only

serviceAccountManagement.note: Please note: Waves Logix does not provide analysis or advisory services related to stock or equity markets.

serviceAnalytics.title: Advanced Forex Market Analysis
serviceAnalytics.subtitle: For Independent Traders & Brokerage Companies
serviceAnalytics.description: High-precision Forex market analysis designed for independent traders and brokerage companies that require more than generic forecasts.
serviceAnalytics.independentDescription: Waves Logix does not manage trading accounts, execute trades, or access client funds. All execution remains fully under your control.

structure.title: High-Precision Market Structure
structure.description: Identification of dominant trends, corrective phases, and structural breakpoints across key Forex pairs.

scenarios.title: Scenario-Based Forecasting
scenarios.description: Multiple validated scenarios with confirmation and invalidation levels for different market outcomes.

levels.title: Key Price Levels & Liquidity Zones
levels.description: Precise mapping of support, resistance, liquidity clusters, and institutional interest areas.

macro.title: Macro & Fundamental Integration
macro.description: Analysis of interest rates, inflation, central bank actions, and global macro drivers.

risk.title: Risk-Aware Framework
risk.description: Volatility expectations, structural risk boundaries, and contextual risk considerations.

whyChoose.title: Why Traders Work With Waves Logix

miniAbout.title: About
miniAbout.description: Waves Logix is an independent analytical and advisory firm specializing in structured Forex, gold, and oil market intelligence for professional investors, traders, and institutions.
miniAbout.descriptionContinued: We operate strictly within an advisory framework, combining deep market expertise, scientific analytical methods, and technology-driven data processing. All client capital remains fully under client control at all times.
miniAbout.motto: Clarity, discipline, and transparency in complex financial markets.

certificate.title: Official
certificate.subtitle: Waves Logix Ltd. is officially incorporated and regulated
certificate.law: International Business Companies Act, Cap 12.14: Section 6

aboutCompany.heroSubtitle: Independent market analysis and advisory support for professional clients
aboutCompany.modelDescription: The firm works exclusively within a transparent, non-custodial advisory model. Waves Logix does not hold client funds, does not provide brokerage services, and does not perform discretionary asset management. Clients retain full ownership and control over their brokerage accounts at all times.
aboutCompany.methodologyDescription: Our analytical framework combines market structure analysis, macroeconomic research, wave-based methodologies, and AI-assisted data processing. Artificial intelligence tools are used to enhance data efficiency and scenario validation, while all final conclusions are made by experienced human analysts.
aboutCompany.complianceDescription: Waves Logix operates with a strong emphasis on compliance, documentation, and professional standards. Official incorporation and corporate documentation are publicly available and may be reviewed for verification purposes.
disclaimerContent: All information provided by Waves Logix Ltd. is for informational and educational purposes only and does not constitute investment advice, financial advice, or a recommendation to buy or sell any financial instrument.
Trading and investing involve risk and may result in loss of capital. Past performance does not guarantee future results. Waves Logix Ltd. makes no guarantees regarding performance or outcomes.
Clients are solely responsible for all trading decisions and must ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations in their jurisdiction.

leadership.heroSubtitle: Meet the mind behind Waves Logix
leadership.founderBio: Waves Logix was founded and is led by Dr. Georg Gershinski, a senior market analyst with more than a decade of professional experience in global financial markets.
leadership.backgroundContent: Dr. Gershinski's background combines extensive practical market expertise with advanced academic education in law. This dual foundation enables a disciplined approach to market analysis that integrates financial logic, regulatory awareness, and risk control.
leadership.experienceContent: Over the course of his career, he has worked across multiple market cycles, volatility regimes, and macroeconomic environments, developing structured analytical methodologies grounded in wave theory, macroeconomic research, and quantitative validation.
leadership.roleContent: As Founder and Managing Director, Dr. Gershinski defines the firm's analytical standards, strategic direction, and ethical framework. All research methodologies and advisory practices at Waves Logix are developed under his direct oversight to ensure consistency, objectivity, and professional accountability.

contact.directContactDescription: Get in touch with us via Telegram for immediate assistance. We're here to help you with any questions about our services.

footer.description: Development of trading strategies based on Elliott Wave theory - scientific approach to the market, the right course in the ocean of the Forex market.
